mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.name,p.description,v.id as vid,vp.amount as vp_amount,v.name as v_name FROM physical_accounts as p left outer join account_stores as vp on vp.physical_account_id=p.id left outer join virtual_accounts as v on v.id=vp.virtual_account_id order by p.id,v.id

SELECT p.id,p.name,p.description,v.id as vid,vp.amount as vp_amount,v.name as v_name FROM physical_accounts as p left outer join account_stores as vp on vp.physical_account_id=p.id left outer join virtual_accounts as v on v.id=vp.virtual_account_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
